sourcesContent:
import axios from 'axios'

export const READ_EVENTS = 'READ_EVENTS'
export const CREATE_EVENT = 'CREATE_EVENT'

const ROOT_URL = 'https://udemy-utils.herokuapp.com/api/v1' //全ての要求で使うURL
const QUERYSTRING = '?token=token123'

export const readEvents = () => async dispatch => { //async,awaitって何！
    const response = await axios.get(`${ROOT_URL}/events${QUERYSTRING}`) //axios.getでAPIサーバにリクエストを送信してデータを受け取る
    dispatch({ type: READ_EVENTS, response }) //actionをstoreに送信
}

export const postEvent = values => async dispatch => { 
    const response = await axios.post(`${ROOT_URL}/events${QUERYSTRING}`, values) //valuesで追加するデータを送信
    dispatch({ type: CREATE_EVENT, response })
}
